name: maplibre-theme-private
description: CSS Themes for your Maplibre GL Js Web app

scripts.dev: postcss --watch -d dist/extra src/themes/legacy/legacy.css src/themes/modern/modern.css src/themes/classic/classic.css --ext .scoped.compat.css --env scoped-compat
scripts.build:scoped: postcss -d dist/extra src/core.css src/themes/legacy/legacy.css src/themes/classic/classic.css src/themes/modern/modern.css --ext .scoped.css --env scoped
scripts.build:compat: postcss -d dist/extra src/themes/legacy/legacy.css src/themes/modern/modern.css src/themes/classic/classic.css --ext .compat.css --env compat
scripts.build:scoped:compat: postcss -d dist/extra src/themes/legacy/legacy.css src/themes/modern/modern.css src/themes/classic/classic.css --ext .scoped.compat.css --env scoped-compat
scripts.build: pnpm build:default && pnpm build:scoped && pnpm build:compat && pnpm build:scoped:compat && pnpm build:icons && node generate-public-package.js

author: Hugues Tavernier
